ambulance.air: Up to Rs. 2,50,000 per hospitalization and maximum up to Rs. 5,00,000 per policy year

restoration_benefit: Up to 100% of Basic SI, once in every policy year. Can be utilized for any claim including modern treatments for subsequent hospitalizations.
wellness_program: Earn reward points and avail premium discount up to 10% on renewal premium.

preventive_health_checkup.benefit: Rs. 2,000 to Rs. 5,000 for every claim free year, based on SI

best_suited_for: Individuals looking for high sum insured options

accidental_death_and_ptd.coverage: Sum Insured amount matches basic SI, up to 100L
accidental_death_and_ptd.notes: For children and persons above 70, coverage is up to 10 Lacs only.

bariatric_surgery.coverage: Rs. 2.5 Lacs to Rs. 5 Lacs based on SI

delivery_expenses.normal: Rs. 15,000 to Rs. 50,000 based on SI
delivery_expenses.cesarean: Rs. 20,000 to Rs. 1,00,000 based on SI

new_born_cover.coverage: Up to Rs. 1 Lac to Rs. 2 Lacs based on SI
new_born_cover.notes: 10% of Sum Insured (Maximum Rs. 50,000) provided Mother is covered for at least 1 year.

vaccination_expenses.coverage: Rs. 5,000 to Rs. 10,000 based on SI

op_dental_ophthalmic_treatment.benefit: Rs. 5,000 to Rs. 15,000 after every block of 3 policy years

outpatient_consultation.benefit: Rs. 1,200 to Rs. 5,000 per policy year

hospital_cash_benefit.notes: 7 days per admission, 120 days in policy year

other_benefits.air_ambulance: Covered up to Rs. 2,50,000 per hospitalization and maximum up to Rs. 5,00,000 per policy year

midterm_inclusion: Available for including Newly married spouse and New Born on paying additional premium
Intimation about the marriage/ newborn should be given within 60 days from the date of marriage/ new born
co_payment: 10% applicable if Insured age at entry is above 60 years
